name: Introduction to Computer Science
description: This course covers the fundamentals of computer science, including topics such as algorithms, data structures, and programming languages.

name: Database Systems
description: This course explores the design and implementation of database systems, covering topics such as relational database theory, normalization, query optimization, and database security.

name: Advanced Database Systems
description: This course covers advanced topics in database systems, such as distributed databases, NoSQL databases, and query processing.
